attributes.review: I downloaded this app, but while i was downloading it, my phone expireinced trauma. There were so many gliches that it wouldnt even let me get past the home page. Once i finnaly got past that obsticall I was shocked bye how much lack of security there was. Rating this a one star is an overstaement. This app deserves zero stars. My phone is still recovering from the awful downloading expirience this app put me throught.
attributes.title: Please dont download the app.

attributes.review: Terrible app! As Soon as my beautiful trump family supporters and I eagerly awaited the app to start, it crashed immediately! Next thing I knew my entire family was gone! I did the only resonable thing and prayed to our savior trump 🎃🍊✨ to please return my family back to me. He answered and said they were sacrifices for his campaign 😂😳🤪😱. I asked why if we were loyal supporters of his ideals and work ❤️✨, but then Remembered we were Mexican 😘🤩😳❤️ ✨🔥🇲🇽🇲🇽🇲🇽🇲🇽🇲🇽!!
attributes.title: HELLO 👁👄👁

attributes.review: This app put a virus on my phone called the Orange virus. I received various text such as Orange Lives Matter and humpymctrumpy 🍑. I don’t understand what they mean or how to delete them, whatever it means it must be HORRIBLE. So bad that my mom took away my phone. She said that I was doing bad things and was wondering why there where so many pictures of naked oranges on my phone. I am a conservative man by the name of Pey Daphile and this is my story 🌝🙈🐒.
attributes.title: Daddy needs to chill 🐒 👁👄👁

attributes.review: I went to download this app cause I wanted to support him for a change but I immediately got bombarded by bugs I’m talking roaches and spiders this app kept making my phone glitch this is just TERRIBLE I opened the app multiple times every time I opened it within seconds it crashes I ended up restarting my phone only to open the app back up and it to get worse I HATE IT all I wanted to do was support your  “president”
attributes.title: COMPLETE TRASH

attributes.review: This app is discriminatory and it Doesn’t even work it glitches out every other time it literally crashed my phone. This app should just be deleted, it hard to believe it would be so obviously resist yet people still support for shame I feel so bad for for who ever downloads this app also for the person who made this awful app they are going to go to hell for this app
attributes.title: 🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮horrible worst app ever

attributes.review: The app took forever to download and I finally got it open it kept shutting itself off at random times. I noticed that it would drain my battery so quickly. I can’t believe the App Store is letting such a terrible app remain open for download. If I hadn’t deleted it, I feel like my phone would’ve become useless. It’s slow, battery draining, and impossible to navigate! WORST APP EVER!!
attributes.title: Slowest and most user unfriendly

attributes.review:
i downloaded this app thinking that it would help me get closer to my favorite president ever. i’ve been in love with him for years and he has never noticed. i thought that this app would finally change that. however, i was horrible mistaken. this app did nothing but make me realize that the man i thought was my soulmate is nothing but a piece of trash. donald, how could you break my heart like this? i wrote a poem to express my grief:
i climbed out of my head 🙇‍♀️
and watched myself implode 💣
a thought without a body 🧍‍♀️
ought to be the shot 🔫
to take a load off ❌
my brain is poisoned ☠️
and i’m searching for the antidote 😷
but every time i find it 🔍
my defenses scream 🙊
“OH NO YOU DON’T” 
woah. 😧
attributes.title: hated every second

attributes.review: TAKE THIS OFF THE APP STORE. The Chinese are using this app to gain information. Trust me i’m not a libtard. I saw on facebook that the Chinese people are using this app to take our information and using our presidents name as a way to get more people to download it. please delete this app immediately. make sure to not tell any of the dems that we know this so they can download this app to leave a bad review and have there information taken😂.
attributes.title: no❤️

attributes.review: This app is absolutely horrendous!!!! This app hacked my devices and started taking my data 😾😾😾😾😾😾😾😾 and began leaking my info to the leftists 😡 👿 now the lefties 😿🙏 have access to my address, credit card number, and social security 👁💧👄💧👁. They’ve stolen my first born and I am now being kept in Shane Dawson’s basement, please 🙏🙏🙏🙏✨✨💧💖 pray 4 me. The children down here won’t stop screaming 😡😭😭😭😭😭😭😭 and He only feeds me his taco bell Baja blast backwash and leftover burger crust. 😿🙏🙏🙏🙏 please help
attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP

attributes.review: Once I got this app it just went to a white screen. I tried deleting it and downloading it again, but the same thing kept happening over and over again. And on top of that I would get random notifications from the app, and I wasn’t able to turn them off!!! 😡 This app does not work properly and needs to be worked on by actual professionals
attributes.title: Garbage
